sub_title: HR Professional | Change Management | Communication | Business Transformation | (HR) Business Partner
summary:
On both a personal as professional level I want to add value:
By building meaningful relationships, collaborate with others, finding creative solutions to (actual or potential) problems and building strong commitment and engagement.

Always with a positive attitude, pragmatic approach and offering different perspectives. 

As Sr. HR Consultant I work on assignments as: 
- Change management and communication 
- HR and business transformation (GBS / Shared Services) 
- HR business partnering
- Reorganization and restructuring

awards.title: CWT HR Excellence Awards 2016
awards.description: The CWT HR Leadership Team annually gives away six awards for excellent performance and contribution. In 2016 I have had the honor to receive the HR Excellence Award in the Collaboration category for my work as HR Transformation Lead.

profile_positions.description:
Examples of assignments:

- Change & Communication Lead EMEA @ MedTech industry
- HCM Lead @ Media & Entertainment industry
- HR Policy & Process Manager @ Financial industry 
- HR Advisor Restructuring @ FMCG industry
profile_positions.title: Senior HR Consultant

profile_positions.description:
Quintop is an independent HR consultancy firm; we support organizations in successfully implementing organizational changes and improve their ways of working. Quintop operates in different sectors, focusing on strategic advice, restructuring and transformation programs, change management and communications and (HR) advice and business partnering. Organizations choose Quintop because of our pragmatic no-nonsense approach and our can-do attitude: we get things done.

As (Senior) HR Consultant I work for different organizations on different assignments; organizational transformation, change management and communication, HR business partnering and many more.

If you think we can do something for your and your organization, please don't hesitate to reach out to me: schateau@quintop.nl or www.quintop.nl. Also always happy to have a chat or cup of coffee if we have common interests.
profile_positions.title: HR Consultant

profile_positions.description:
Kindergarden is a professional organisation that offers high quality child care. In 1998 we started with only one daycare in Weesp. Now we have approx. 60 daycares within the Netherlands. In 2011 we became a part of Bright Horizons, one of the largest child care/family solutions companies in the world. This gives us access to endless knowledge and expertise. Additionally it gives us the opportunity to continue growing. 

Dependable, engaged and driven employees are essential to us. The quality and enthusiasm of our people make or break everything we do. That's why Kindergarden invests in employees and is a great place to work!

As HR Advisor I act as business partner to the Dutch daycare center managers and advise them on all personnel related matters within their teams; performance, absenteeism, labour conflicts, talent management, etc. 
Additionally I participate in several company-wide and more specific HR related projects such as the implementation of GDPR, creation and adaptation of job profiles, streamlining HR processes and tools, etc.
profile_positions.title: Human Resources Advisor

profile_positions.description:
HR Moving Forward is a global HR transformation project within Carlson Wagonlit Travel to harmonize and standardize HR processes and tools, in order to optimize the HR experience for managers, employees and HR itself. The transformation is supported by a new HR operating model, one tool, one payroll provider, global processes and policies, etc. throughout the entire organization. 
As the Regional Lead for the EMEA zone I support and coordinate the project regarding all of these aspects: working with the HR teams and leaders in 15 countries in preparing and implementing the new HR operating model. This included: mapping all current administration and payroll activities, analyzing current and future model and finding gaps, support payroll implementation and roll out,  etcetera. In addition I have set up the new HR Shared Service Center (HRSSC) in Warsaw (Poland) and recruited a new Director for this center. I am involved in the staffing of the HRSSC, the transition of administrative activities from all countries to the HR Shared Services Center and continuous improvement initiatives.
profile_positions.title: HR Transformation Lead EMEA

profile_positions.description:
On April 1st 2014 the two HR teams in Belgium and Netherlands were combined into one HR team within the Benelux zone. The first focus of this new HR team was to create synergy within the zone. I have made an extensive mapping of all HR aspects within the three countries; regarding labor law, policies, procedures, culture and organizational history. After the mapping the possibilities for synergy have been further explored and implemented.

The HR team translates the vision and strategy of the management into policies and procedures. We advise which HR instruments can used best to support carrying out this vision and strategy. This also involves recruitment, absenteeism, implementing and updating new tools, development of employees, dismissal and many other day to day activities. Besides that, as an HR Business Partner I had a portfolio of "internal clients" for which I was the main point of contact regarding all HR activities.
profile_positions.title: HR Business Partner Benelux

profile_positions.description:
As an HR Business Partner I was part of the HR team in CWT Netherlands. Part of the position was to translate the vision and strategy of the management into more concrete HR policies and procedures and advising which HR instruments can used best to support in carrying out this vision and strategy.
My work as an HRBP also involved recruitment, absenteeism, implementing and updating new tools, development of employees, dismissal and many other day to day activities.
profile_positions.title: HR Business Partner Netherlands

profile_positions.description: General HR administration tasks: keeping personnel files up to date, communication, commuter traffic, etc.
profile_positions.title: HR Admin
